channel.title: What is your favorite FPS (first person shooter)
channel.description:
[b][i][u][size=24pt]Modern Warfare2[/size][/u][/i][/b]
love the storyline although it is very short it was about a 8/10 for me. My favorite mission was when the spetnazs(Russian special forces the equivalent to that of a US Army Ranger)were attacking DC in that mission i thought it was especially fun to play around with that .50 cal. with the thermal scope, and when you where in the black hawk helicopter on the mini-gun.
I love the multiplayer on there(don't ask for my gammer tag I currently don't have Xbox live) I use a few differant classes but im only gonna post one my sniper class(im such a bast at sniping!) I use the .50 cal. or the m21 ebr with increased bullet penetration my secondary weapon is the Akimbo m9s. Perks scavenger pro, commando pro, and cold-blood pro and for my death streak perk i use the final stand perk.
now I know alot of you haters out there don't like the game that's fine. I think it is a great game.So please tell me what is your favorite fps. If you don't like MW2, simply put I don't like MW2. there isn't a need for a 3 paragraph essay about how much you hate and tbh no one is gonna care enough to read that.

item.title: What is your favorite FPS (first person shooter)
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“rain1994, post:63, topic:350237”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=446603.msg3280588#msg3280588 date=1279842223]

I also love battlefield badcompany2 on multi I LOVE the bullet drop for the sniper rifle makes it so much rewarding when you get that perfect headshot. I remeber my uncle had got the demo on xbox and he told me sniping was sooooo hard I was like I bet you i get a headshot my first try and said ill give you 20$ if you do. It was the demo so only one map Alaaska and that huge ass hill that looks over the fighting below then the unfinished building infront of it. I was on the hill and I saw another sniper he shot right at me I was like that little bitch shot at me! ( I was planning to shoot him but thats just what I said lol) He missed and I shot and boom headshot! I told my uncle pay up. I spent the 20$ on candy… yes I have a addiction to candy.

@everyone
inb4coolstorybro
[/quote]

@everyone
inb4coolstorybro what english please lol[/quote]

Someone was going to post cool story bro to your story.
I was stopping them.

Read full topic
item.source: What is your favorite FPS (first person shooter)
